programme.title: Siccin 2
programme.desc: Adnan dan Hicran selamat berkahwin namun apabila anak Lelakimereka meninggal dunia akibat kemalangan misteri Adanan menjadi jauh daripada isterinya. Hicran mula menyiasat masa lalunya untuk melihat bagaimana ia boleh dikaitkan dengan kematian anaknya.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep3
programme.desc: Mengisahkan semasa Eliza bersama bodyguardnya Danial dia nyaris dilanggar. Mereka syak Amran seorang kakitangan Eliza melakukan cubaan tersebut. Hubungan percintaan Eliza dengan Rashid masih berterusan. Farish sebagai bodyguard, masih meneruskan jagaan keselamatan kepada Adam. Dia beberapa kali menyelamatkan Adam dari dipukul oleh Zack dan rakan kumpulannnya. Adam dikatakan membocor rahsia kumpulan kepada polis sehingga ada di kalangan mereka yang telah tertangkap. Ryan bodyguard Datin Maziah, dia menunjukkan photo perhubungan Datin Maziah dengan Badrul kepada Dato’ Zailani. Akhirnya Dato’ Zailani menceraikan Datin Maziah. Di akhir episod, Amran melihat Rashid berbaik-baik dengan Eliza, dia memberi amaran kepada Rashid untuk membocorkan rahsia mereka kepada Eliza sekiranya tidak memberi wang kepadanya.

programme.title: Psiko Pencuri Hati
programme.desc: Sejauh manakah anda akan pergi dalam penyelidikan anda untuk menulis novel tentang pembunuh bersiri? Adakah anda fikir lika seorang pembunuh? Soalan ini memakan watak utama, Osidi. Dia terobsesi dengan penyelidikannya untuk melengkapkan bab terakhirnya dalam novelnya yang bertajuk "The Victim". Osidi yang jiwanya yang celaka seolah-olah berada dalam pertempuran berterusan dengan dirinya sendiri cuba mencari beberapa daun ketenangan ke sebuah pulau. Namun, ketegangan itu timbul apabila seorang lagi mayat ditemui di pulau itu... Adakah dia pembunuh sebenar?

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep5
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ryan bodyguard kepada Dato' Amir memujuk Mak Jah untuk kembali kepada bekas suaminya. Ryan akan dibayar RM 50 ribu sekiranya berjaya memujuk Mak Jah tetapi ditolak kerana Mak Jah terlalu marahkan kepada Dato' Amir. Dalam kes berasingan, Adam masih tidak mahu memberi buku senarai Ahli Kobra kepada bodyguardnya Farish selagi belum pasti keselamatannya. Zack dari Kumpulan Kobra menyamar sebagai rakan sekolah Adam, Datin Maya bersetuju supaya Adam meneruskan pengajiannya bersama Zack. Di rumah datuknya, Adam mulai minat belajar silat kerana terpikat dengan Hanis. Eliza tidak percaya dengan Rashid. Danial, bodyguardnya diminta menyiasat pergerakan Rashid dan Amran. Rohani akhirnya mengaku dia diupah Amran untuk mengaku sebagai kekasih Rashid. Rahul pula sebagai bodyguard Maya membenarkan Mikhail dan isterinya Zulaikha berjumpa dengan Boboy tetapi perlu dirahsiakan. Maya masih berkeras tidak membenarkan Mikhail berjumpa dengan anaknya. Semua maklumat di atas telah dilaporkan kepada ketuanya Nasha secara harian, Ryan cuba memikat Nasha.

programme.title: Algojo: Perang Santet
programme.desc: Desta ialah seorang dewasa yang misteri dan menyendiri yang mencari orang yang bertanggungjawab atas kematian ibu bapanya kerana ingin membalas dendam. Dia mesti memutuskan sama ada untuk memenuhi keinginannya atau memilih tindakan yang lebih beradab.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep4
programme.desc: Mengisahkan encik Bad mengarahkan Shah dan Adam menangkap lembaga lilin yang suka berselfie dengan mereka-mereka yang suka bersiar di waktu malam. Sementara itu anak gadis Encik Bad menceritakan dua kini disukai oleh Shah dan Adam. Ketika mendapat taklimat di rumah encik Bad, Shah dan Adam ambil kesempatan memikat Nur di dapur dalam waktu yang berlainan. Hingga kini encik Bad dan di antara kedua mereka tidak tahu rahsia masing-masing. Langkah awal misi menangkap lembaga lilin bermula di mana Shah Dan Adam ke sebuah taman dan dapat mengesan lembaga lilin. Walau pun mereka menembak ke sasaran setelah muncul beberapa kali tetapi selepas beberapa ketika lembaga itu hilang. Daniel terasa dia ditipu dan kini kembali bersama dengan Shah dan Adam dan turut bersama mengesan lembaga lilin. Kini mereka bertiga terus mengesan dan bertembung beberapa kali, tetapi gagal untuk diperangkap. Mereka memadamkan lilin yang dipegang lembaga sebagai satu taktik, itu pun gagal kerana lembaga dapat memasangkan lilin semula. Hingga kini, misi mereka belum berjaya.

programme.title: The Hotel
programme.desc: Sarapee dan Pun mewarisi rumah agam pantai daripada Luang Narubal, suami dan dermawan yang mereka khianati dan tinggalkan untuk mati dalam kesedihan. Kedua-duanya kini memutuskan untuk berpindah dan menjadikan rumah agam itu sebagai hotel untuk menjana wang. Dua puluh lima tahun berlalu. Sarapee telah meninggal dunia. Dua anaknya hasil perkahwinannya dengan Pun, Parinya dan Patama, kini sudah dewasa dan mereka pulang dari menetap di luar negara untuk mengambil alih hotel tersebut. Selepas mengubahsuainya, misteri bermula. Kematian berlaku berulang kali, dan kadangkala Parinya dan Pattama menyaksikannya. Tidak lama kemudian mereka adalah satu-satunya orang yang tinggal untuk membongkar misteri dan berjuang untuk terus hidup. Tetapi siapakah pembunuh misteri itu?

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep5
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ryan bodyguard kepada Dato' Amir memujuk Mak Jah untuk kembali kepada bekas suaminya. Ryan akan dibayar RM 50 ribu sekiranya berjaya memujuk Mak Jah tetapi ditolak kerana Mak Jah terlalu marahkan kepada Dato' Amir. Dalam kes berasingan, Adam masih tidak mahu memberi buku senarai Ahli Kobra kepada bodyguardnya Farish selagi belum pasti keselamatannya. Zack dari Kumpulan Kobra menyamar sebagai rakan sekolah Adam, Datin Maya bersetuju supaya Adam meneruskan pengajiannya bersama Zack. Di rumah datuknya, Adam mulai minat belajar silat kerana terpikat dengan Hanis. Eliza tidak percaya dengan Rashid. Danial, bodyguardnya diminta menyiasat pergerakan Rashid dan Amran. Rohani akhirnya mengaku dia diupah Amran untuk mengaku sebagai kekasih Rashid. Rahul pula sebagai bodyguard Maya membenarkan Mikhail dan isterinya Zulaikha berjumpa dengan Boboy tetapi perlu dirahsiakan. Maya masih berkeras tidak membenarkan Mikhail berjumpa dengan anaknya. Semua maklumat di atas telah dilaporkan kepada ketuanya Nasha secara harian, Ryan cuba memikat Nasha.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Seorang pembuat kertas terlibat dengan kes pembunuhan mengenai dua penjenayah yang membawa kepada seorang detektif yang nekad mengesyaki dia dan bapa ganas bekas itu mencarinya.

programme.title: Siccin 2
programme.desc: Adnan dan Hicran selamat berkahwin namun apabila anak Lelakimereka meninggal dunia akibat kemalangan misteri Adanan menjadi jauh daripada isterinya. Hicran mula menyiasat masa lalunya untuk melihat bagaimana ia boleh dikaitkan dengan kematian anaknya.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep14
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Farish sebagai bodyguard pelakon Kasandra menjumpai telefon tangan kedua yang sealu digunakan oleh Mazlan untuk mengugut Kasandra. Farish memaklumkan kepada Kasandra supaya memecat Mazlan. Dalam kes berasingan, Nasha mengambil Bakri seorang bodyguard baru untuk menggantikan Rahul, pada masa yang sama dapat membantu Ryan menyelesaikan kes Haris dan Anuar. Ryan mendapati lokasi kegiatan haram Samad telah berpindah ke lokasi baru. Dia menjalankan menjual dadah. Sementara itu, Hakim dan Yasmin yang lari dari rumah. Semasa berkelah, Hakim telah memukul pengurus pusat perkelahan dan Yasmin kerana marah dengan mereka. Perhubungan Farish dengan Nasha semakin erat setelah Farish menghadiahkan bunga kepadanya.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penyelidik paranormal yang dikenali sebagai 'Puaka X" berputus asa dengan kewujudan makhluk rohani seperti itu, sehingga mereka menemui balai polis yang ditinggalkan di Gombak.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep6
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ryan berjaya memujuk Nasha dan Mak Jah bergambar. Gambar ini ditunjukkan kepada Dato' Amir. Ryan dibayar ganjaran RM50 ribu kerana berjaya mengesan Mak Jah. Mereka juga menyewa rumah lain untuk Mak Jah. Dalam kes berasingan, Farish sebagai bodyguard bersama Adam meneruskan latihan persilatan dengan datuknya. Perhubungan Adam dengan Hanis semakin mesra. Danial sebagai bodyguard Eliza telah mendapat rahsia Rashid dan Amran. Mereka pernah bersamasama melakukan penculikan ke atas Eliza. Dengan sebab itu Eliza mengambil keputusan tidak lagi mahu berhubung dengan Rashid, Amran pula telah diberhentikan kerja. Rahul sebagai bodyguard Maya memberi amaran kepada Mikhail supaya tidak lagi berjumpa dengan Boboy tetapi Boboy masih berkeras mahu berjumpa dengan ayahnya Mikhail. Diakhir episod, Eliza diculik oleh Amran semasa Rahul bodyguardnya keluar mengambil barang yang tertinggal dari dalam kereta

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep14
programme.desc: Memaparkan Shah, Adam dan Daniel terus mengesan lembaga baju yang memakai baju budaya Jepun dan satu malam mereka ternampaknya dan rupanya cantik. Mereka tidak gunakan senjata biasa tetapi menggunakan taktik memujuk. Mereka gagal juga, lembaga itu terus menghilang. Di waktu siang, Shah secara kebetulan bertemu Ana dan Shah seperti biasa cuba merayu dan memikatnya. Kebetulan Adam ternampak lebih-lebih kelihatan Ana menyukai Shah semula. Bila Ana beredar, Adam bersemuka meminta Shah memaklumkan tentang Nur. Adam tidak setuju. Dalam pada itu janda yang berbaik dengan Bad terus akrab, Nur tidak menyukainya lalu menceritakan kepada ibunya. Ibunya hanya menyokong sekurang-kurangnya Nur akan mudah. Encik Tar masih memujuk encik Bad untuk bergabung sebaliknya encik Bad masih memberi alasan sedang berfikir dan dia juga meminta pandangan janda yang suka mendekainya. Oleh kerana sukar lembaga baju di perangkap Shah, Adam dan Daniel memerangkap lembaga Jepun dahulu. Dengan kerjasama lembaga Jepun akhirnya kembaga baju dapat diperangkap mereka. Kini Sabariah dan suaminya senang hati.

programme.title: The Hunter
programme.desc: Seorang Lelakimuda bernama "Mhuek" mempunyai impian untuk menjadi seorang doktor, menyelamatkan nyawa orang ramai, tetapi kehidupan tidak selalu seperti yang kita inginkan. Dia harus menjadi pembunuh bukannya penyelamat nyawa. "Membunuh orang adalah dosa, sayangku" adalah amaran daripada ibunya yang masih bergema kuat dan jelas di dalam hatinya

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Tiada Esok Bagimu
programme.desc: Ghazlan seorang arkitek yang mempunyai dua orang anak, Amir dan Emi. Akibat satu peristiwa yang menyebabkan kematian Emi, Ghazlan menjadi buta kerana terlalu sedih. Selepas itu Ghazlan bersama isterinya mengambil seorang anak angkat yang dinamakan Emi. Identiti sebenar Emi dirahsiakan sehingga dia dewasa. Satu tragedi berlaku kepada Emi sehingga dia nekad untuk mencari ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato’ Iskandar. Dato’ Iskandar ingin menjodohkan Milah dengan anaknya, Ikhsan namun anaknya itu berkeras hati tidak mahu menurut kemahuan bapanya. Demi mengelakkan daripada menanggung malu, Milah bersetuju dinikahkan dengan Jiman, pengurus syarikat Dato’ Iskandar. Milah dan Jiman terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya sehingga mengakibatkan Jiman lumpuh dan mengalami kecederaan otak yang serius. Keadaan menjadi semakin teruk apabila Ikhsan memaksa Jiman untuk melepaskan Milah kerana dia ingin memperisterikan Milah.

programme.title: Bila Hati Telah Retak
programme.desc: Diceraikan oleh suami kaki perempuan, seorang wanita memulakan kehidupan baru. Bekerja sebagai bidan kerajaan - namun tidak disenangi seorang bidan tradisional. Pelbagai tohmahan dilemparkan kepadanya sebagai cara untuk dia diusir keluar tetapi bapa saudaranya ada memberikan sokongan moral. Setelah satu insiden berlaku di kampung itu, penduduk lain mula menerimanya.

programme.title: Esok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Kematian satu-satunya anak miliknya akibat leukemia mengubah hidup seorang pegawai polis. ASP Zamri kemudiannya bertemu dengan Marina dan menjalinkan hubungan sulit bersamanya. Pelbagai halangan perlu dihadapinya oleh kerana kerjanya sebagai seorang pegawai polis. Akhirnya, Marina dan Zamri pun berkahwin dan dikurniakan anak - namun anak tersebut diserahkan kepada isteri pertama Zamri, Faridah untuk dijaga.

programme.title: Melati Putih
programme.desc: Melati bercita-cita tinggi tetapi tidak dapat melaksanakannya kerana tergoda dengan seorang doktor muda. Akibat hubungan dengan doktor itu, nama baiknya telah tercemar. Seorang pemuda cacat di kampung itu jatuh hati padanya tetapi cinta lelaki itu dipermainkannya. Setelah Melati dikecewakan oleh doktor itu, barulah dia sedar cinta suci si pemuda itu.

programme.title: Penghujung Malam
programme.desc: Razak yang telah merantau membawa diri setelah rumahtangganya runtuh kira-kira 15 tahun yang lalu telah kembali ke Malaysia. Niatnya hanya satu, mahu membina semula rumahtangganya dan memastikan anaknya Rita yang kini berusia 19 tahun dan merupakan seorang penyanyi terkenal mendapat kasih sayang seorang bapa. Malangnya, bekas isteri dan anaknya itu tidak mahu menerima Razak malah menaruh perasaan benci yang amat sangat terhadap dirinya.

programme.title: Semalam di Malaysia
programme.desc: Victor Abdullah, penyanyi terkenal yang menetap di Malaysia berkenalan dengan Sandra, mahasiswa di Indonesia. Rumimah, pembantu rumah Sandra ternyata bukanlah seperti apa yang disangka Sandra. Rahsia dan kisah silam terungkit kembali apabila suami dan anak lelakinya yang disangka telah meninggal dunia sebenarnya masih hidup. Pertemuan semula mereka telah membongkar segalanya.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Tiada Esok Bagimu
programme.desc: Ghazlan seorang arkitek yang mempunyai dua orang anak, Amir dan Emi. Akibat satu peristiwa yang menyebabkan kematian Emi, Ghazlan menjadi buta kerana terlalu sedih. Selepas itu Ghazlan bersama isterinya mengambil seorang anak angkat yang dinamakan Emi. Identiti sebenar Emi dirahsiakan sehingga dia dewasa. Satu tragedi berlaku kepada Emi sehingga dia nekad untuk mencari ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. programme.title: Melati Putih
programme.desc: Melati bercita-cita tinggi tetapi tidak dapat melaksanakannya kerana tergoda dengan seorang doktor muda. Akibat hubungan dengan doktor itu, nama baiknya telah tercemar. Seorang pemuda cacat di kampung itu jatuh hati padanya tetapi cinta lelaki itu dipermainkannya. Setelah Melati dikecewakan oleh doktor itu, barulah dia sedar cinta suci si pemuda itu.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Selepas kematian isteri tercinta, Mahmud, seorang hartawan telah berkahwin dengan Zubaidah, yang merupakan janda anak satu. Mahmud mempunyai seorang anak lelaki bernama Anuar dan anak angkat perempuan bernama Mira. Baharum, anak kepada Zubaidah berkawan baik dengan Mira. Apabila mereka meningkat dewasa, hubungan mereka bertambah erat dan saling mencintai antara satu sama lain. Anuar tidak senang dengan perhubungan itu kerana khuatir harta ayahnya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Penghujung Malam
programme.desc: Razak yang telah merantau membawa diri setelah rumahtangganya runtuh kira-kira 15 tahun yang lalu telah kembali ke Malaysia. Niatnya hanya satu, mahu membina semula rumahtangganya dan memastikan anaknya Rita yang kini berusia 19 tahun dan merupakan seorang penyanyi terkenal mendapat kasih sayang seorang bapa. programme.title: Menanti Hari Esok
programme.desc: Kisah sebuah keluarga yang mengalami kejatuhan moral kerana pegangan agama yang tidak utuh. Talib yang menghidapi barah harus melalui pelbagai konflik sementara menunggu masa untuk pergi. Anaknya, Jalil mula bersikap derhaka manakala anak keduanya, Ayu hamil luar nikah. Perasaan dikhianati dan ingin mengkhianati mula menguasai diri, pengakhirannya membawa kepada satu kematian.

programme.title: Penghujung Malam
programme.desc: Razak yang telah merantau membawa diri setelah rumahtangganya runtuh kira-kira 15 tahun yang lalu telah kembali ke Malaysia. Akhirnya, Marina dan Zamri pun berkahwin dan dikurniakan anak - namun anak tersebut diserahkan kepada isteri pertama Zamri, Faridah untuk dijaga.

programme.title: Bila Hati Telah Retak
programme.desc: Diceraikan oleh suami kaki perempuan, seorang wanita memulakan kehidupan baru. Bekerja sebagai bidan kerajaan - namun tidak disenangi seorang bidan tradisional. Pelbagai tohmahan dilemparkan kepadanya sebagai cara untuk dia diusir keluar tetapi bapa saudaranya ada memberikan sokongan moral. Setelah satu insiden berlaku di kampung itu, penduduk lain mula menerimanya.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato’ Iskandar. Dato’ Iskandar ingin menjodohkan Milah dengan anaknya, Ikhsan namun anaknya itu berkeras hati tidak mahu menurut kemahuan bapanya. Demi mengelakkan daripada menanggung malu, Milah bersetuju dinikahkan dengan Jiman, pengurus syarikat Dato’ Iskandar. Milah dan Jiman terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya sehingga mengakibatkan Jiman lumpuh dan mengalami kecederaan otak yang serius. Keadaan menjadi semakin teruk apabila Ikhsan memaksa Jiman untuk melepaskan Milah kerana dia ingin memperisterikan Milah.

programme.title: Melati Putih
programme.desc: Melati bercita-cita tinggi tetapi tidak dapat melaksanakannya kerana tergoda dengan seorang doktor muda. Akibat hubungan dengan doktor itu, nama baiknya telah tercemar. Seorang pemuda cacat di kampung itu jatuh hati padanya tetapi cinta lelaki itu dipermainkannya. Setelah Melati dikecewakan oleh doktor itu, barulah dia sedar cinta suci si pemuda itu.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Pak Tam Duda
programme.desc: seorang duda dan usahawan yang berjaya di dalam kampungnya . Dia juga dihormati oleh orang-orang kampung kerana kebaikan dan kemurahan hatinya . muncul seorang gadis bandar serta teman lelakinya yang mempunyai niat jahat untuk menggoda dan mengikis segala wang dan harta lelaki itu.

programme.title: A Moment In Time
programme.desc: pengembaraan Seorang artis untuk cuba memenangi semula hati wanita yang dicintainya.

programme.title: Tmo Bro Nampak Motor Gua

programme.title: Sucinya Ratna
programme.desc: Sepasang adik beradik tinggal bersama dalam keadaan serba sederhana. Kakaknya sentiasa berusaha membiayai kos pembelajaran adiknya namun, mereka masih menghadapi masalah sehingga adanya konflik antara mereka.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12

programme.title: Tasbih Usang

programme.title: Kl Wangan
programme.desc: Hong dan Yudi yang berkongsi sejarah mengenai lumba kereta jalanan, dari kereta biasa sehinggalah kereta berkuasa tinggi. Selepas bertahun membawa haluan masing-masing, kedua-dua sibuk mengembangkan perniagaan mereka. Satu hari, mereka secara tidak sengaja bertemu semula di satu perlumbaan tanpa menyedari mereka bersaing sesama sendiri.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: seorang lelaki yang ditugaskan untuk menentang penjenayah yang bermaharajalela dan bertindak zalim terhadap penduduk kampung . Pengembaraan tersebut dilalui dengan pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan . Lelaki tersebut bukan sahaja terpaksa berhadapan dengan penjenayah malah pemimpin yang menyalahgunakan kuasa dalam menjalankan tugas yang diamanahkan

programme.title: Gila Gusti
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua orang sahabat, Mamat dan Zul, obses terhadap gusti dan mengidolakan seorang ahli gusti bernama Naga. Apabila Naga tewas dalam perlawanannya dan patah semangat untuk terus bergusti, Mamat dan Zul nekad untuk membantu idola mereka mencari semula semangat yang hilang demi memenangi semua kejuaraan gusti Asia Pasifik.

programme.title: Gentleman T
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah empat beradik "T", Tu, Ta, Tom dan Tam. Tahun persekolahan baru baru sahaja bermula dan keempat-empatnya mempunyai kelas baharu. Masing-masing mahukan sepasang kasut tenis baru yang mahal, tetapi mereka tidak mahu menyusahkan ibu bapa mereka. Mereka memutuskan untuk menghasilkan t-shirt untuk dijual kepada rakan mereka di sekolah.

programme.title: Reza, Arman & Bill
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Reza seorang pemuda yang gilakan bola sepak. Sehariannya tidak lengkap tanpa membincangkan tentang bola sepak. Dia juga seorang pemain amatur yang hebat, terutama bermain futsal. Namun setelah dia cedera, yang mana kecederaan itu telah disengajakan oleh musuhnya, Arman, dia tidak mampu untuk bermain lagi.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S14 Ep10
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Berhadapan dengan berbagai masalah akibat dirinya yang sering menyendiri dan cuba mencari identiti dirinya sendiri . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri

programme.title: Putar Alam
programme.desc: kegiatan jenayah yang dilakukan oleh seorang pemuda bersama rakan-rakannya untuk menjadi cepat kaya. Melalui perniagaan salun rambut mereka menipu pelanggan dalam berbagai cara untuk mendapatkan wang.

programme.desc: Mengisahkan keadaan Kampung Cenderang yang menerima ancaman komunis selama 14 hari. Kisah bermula selepas Anum menjadi saksi pertama melihat mayat kakaknya, Salmah digantung di sebatang pokok tidak jauh dari kampung berkenaan.

programme.desc: seorang wanita miskin yang diperkosa hingga mengandung, Dia memuja kepada penunggu pokok untuk membalas dendam dan menjadi kaya. Penunggu bersetuju menunaikan hajat dengan syarat anaknya menjadi pertukaran.

programme.title: Rompak Raya
programme.desc: Amy dan Awie memerlukan duit demi menyambut hari raya lalu mereka nekad untuk merompak sehari sebelum raya. Tanpa disangka mereka dikepung oleh polis dan terperangkap dalam kedai tersebut bersama Mak Teh, Suraya dan Geeta.

programme.title: Kanta Serigala
programme.desc: seorang abang yang cuba membalas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Adiknya seorang remaja berbakat berkeinginan untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi terkenal dan berpengaruh seperti penyanyi pujaannya telah menjadi mangsa penipuan, diperkosa dan dibunuh dua lelaki yang menyamar kakitangan syarikat rakam

programme.title: Mat Kari Mek Tomyam
programme.desc: Wanda seorang gadis kampung yang datang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja di sebuah Café milik makciknya, telah bertemu dengan seorang jejaka yang gila dengan masakan Kari dan Wanda seorang yang hanya pandai memasak Tom Yam yang akhirnya menjadi satu cinta. Pelbagai dugaan dan telatah mereka berdua yang ditempuh semasa mengenali antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Bangkitnya Mayit
programme.desc: seorang wanita miskin yang diperkosa hingga mengandung, Dia memuja kepada penunggu pokok untuk membalas dendam dan menjadi kaya. Penunggu bersetuju menunaikan hajat dengan syarat anaknya menjadi pertukaran.

programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Paku Pontianak

programme.title: Debu Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Mandala Penakluk Satria Tar Tar
programme.desc: Kisah perjuangan seorang pahlawan untuk menyelamatkan negerinya dijajah oleh kaum lain. Pahlawan tersebut ke negeri penjajah untuk membantah tindakan mereka yang kejam menjajah negerinya.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Kamu Nanyea Kenapa Kita Saling Cinta
programme.desc: Monica adalah anak pembantu di rumah Vino. Mereka memiliki status sosial yang berbeza tetapi saling menyukai, namun tidak direstui oleh orang tua Vino. Adakah cinta mereka akan bersatu?

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep153
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Star Ep77
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep20
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep100
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep141
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Kesempatan Kedua
programme.desc: Roni terkejut kerana telah melanggar ibu kepada bakal isterinya sehingga mati iaitu Sheila. Kerana panik dan tertekan, Roni hanya melarikan diri. Satu-satunya saksi kejadian itu ialah Ardi. Tetapi Roni meminta Ardi mendiamkan diri tentang kejadian itu.

programme.title: Suster El Ep18
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep19
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Trayek Angkutan Jodoh Jurusan KUA
programme.desc: Gea merasa bahagia sejak mengenali Julian, hingga Gea sanggup menjadi pemandu bas mini. Atas cadangan Julian, Gea bersetuju untuk berkahwin dengan pilihan ayahnya. Namun, menjelang hari perkahwinan, Gea berada dalam dilema dan hatinya terus mengingati Julian.

programme.title: Temu Lawak Ep3
programme.desc: Temu Lawak adalah rancangan komedi dengan kumpulan legenda Srimulat yang akan membuat kemunculan semula melalui rancangan ini. Turut dimeriahkan oleh ramai pelawak dan artis undangan. Di Temu Lawak, pelawak bersatu kembali dengan kisah kontemporari yang dibalut dengan komedi gaya Srimulat.

programme.title: Kesempatan Kedua

Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep101
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep142
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Tukang Rias Unlimited Edition
programme.desc: Daripada merosakkan perkahwinan Anita untuk membalas dendam peribadi, Maya menjadikannya menakjubkan dengan hasil soleknya.

programme.title: Suster El Ep19
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep20
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Cintamu Sehangat Kuah Sotomu
programme.desc: Mila diminta oleh sahabatnya, Bella, untuk mencari keberadaan keluarganya yang hilang hanya dengan menggunakan rantai leher dan foto sebagai petunjuk. Namun, dengan tidak disangka, Mila bertemu dengan Gilang yang salah menganggap Mila sebagai adiknya, tetapi ternyata bukan.

programme.title: Temu Lawak Ep4
programme.desc: Temu Lawak adalah rancangan komedi dengan kumpulan legenda Srimulat yang akan membuat kemunculan semula melalui rancangan ini. Turut dimeriahkan oleh ramai pelawak dan artis undangan. Di Temu Lawak, pelawak bersatu kembali dengan kisah kontemporari yang dibalut dengan komedi gaya Srimulat.

programme.title: Panji Petualang 911 Ep7
programme.desc: Tonton program Panji Petualang 911 untuk mempelajari tentang haiwan dan memerhati keunikan alam liar sambil berseronok dalam pengembaraan bersama Panji.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep38
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: Coffee Mate
programme.desc: A housewife meets a carpenter at a cafe. They become "coffee mates" where they have no other means of contact besides meeting at the cafe. Soon they find themselves developing feeling for each other.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesn’t last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Warriors Of The Dawn
programme.desc: To avoid invading Japanese forces, King Seonjo escapes to the Ming Empire. In his place, Prince Gwanghae leads the royal court and confronts the enemies with the help of proxy soldiers led by To-woo.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Memories Of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: Deep Trap
programme.desc: A couple travel to a remote island for a restaurant famous online, yet unexpected danger awaits when they met the restaurant owner.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: When a bad-boy movie star hires a real gangster to take on an opposing role to avoid a scandal after beating a fellow actor half to death, he gets more than he bargained for from this replacement.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Where The Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: After barely surviving a violent attack by an elusive serial killer, a crime boss finds himself forming an unlikely partnership with a local detective to catch the sadistic killer.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep454
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep4849
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep6
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep845846
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep678
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3379
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46534654
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep5152
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1827
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2058
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep952
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earth’s surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2012
programme.desc: This beloved slapstick comedy series continues as it follows four couples who meet through a dating website. Four men go on a heroic mission to help four women and wind up experiencing a series of mishaps.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protégé Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: A House of Happiness
programme.desc: Uncle Shui suffers from Alzheimer's disease but still remembers his son and late wife. His caregiver Ha Gu leaves him as she cannot stand his bad temper. He then falls in love with a woman who looks like his late wife but has a hidden agenda. His neighbours try to seek help from Ha Gu and Shui’s son to make Shui see the truth about the newcomer.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Chefs
programme.desc: After being ousted from the clan, disgraced chef Wong encounters cooking prodigy Lung and takes him on as a new disciple in his new restaurant. With the Top Chef competition coming up, it's now up to Lung to reclaim his master's honour, even if the other side is not fighting fair…

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: When a dog is in need of rescue, the Paws-Men assemble to save the dog like Batman. “Paws-Men” tells the story of four men rescuing dogs and the many difficulties that they encounter, from a dog eatery to bullies and a dog abusing granny. Despite the hardships, Paws-Men give us a peek into the true friendships between dogs and humans.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan (Eric Tsang), actor Cheung Chau Wan (Jim Chim), gynecologist Fu Mo Sum (Wong Jing), feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung (Chapman To), and dance coach Charlie Lam (Det Dik) - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu (Richard Ng), who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives (Maggie Cheung Ho Yee, Yeung Sze Man, Monica Chan, Mak Ling Ling, and Jacqueline Chong).

programme.title: Kung Fu Fighter
programme.desc: Ma goes in search of his father in Shanghai. Inheriting his father’s physical strength, Ma gets hired by a boxing club and befriends Fatty. As a result of Fatty using fake notes to bet at the triad’s boxing club, both of them are hunted down by the gangsters. Luckily they are saved by some martial arts masters but the fight has only just begun.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng and Chrissie Chau reunite in this romantic-comedy about three heartbroken men who each purchase an iGirl, the latest smart-robot, as their new girlfriends.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness…

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees’ performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earth’s surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master’s daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - “Twelve Deadly Coins” and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her…

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: Return Of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas’ pursuit.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong’s caught in the Mong’s territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping’s limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit’s camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader’s wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him…

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actor, Danny Lee, who is both director and main actor in this film. Danny Li is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured during an illegal race. Mai Tak Lo is the student of Li. With Li’s help, Mai wins a race in Macau. However, because of money and honour, Mai starts to join illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out…

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Li’s wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Li’s Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mother’s death – a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the ‘Flying Guillotine Squad’, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General’s daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Call To Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - “Black Leopard”. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of “Black Leopard”, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma breaks when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Clan Of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper’s daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and managed to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: Irumugan features Actor Vikram, Actress Nayanthara & Actress Nithya Menon. Iru Mugan is a science fiction action thriller film written and directed by Anand Shankar. The story revolves around a RAW agent couple (Vikram & Nayantara) and an evil minded scientist named Love. One of the Blockbuster Hit movie in 2016

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: A Scene By The Sea
programme.desc: Cuc and her husband travel to a remote seaside town to attend their daughter's shotgun wedding. As the elderly couple start having disagreements about wedding finances, the secrets of their seemingly perfect marriage are gradually revealed.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Welcome At Esposito's
programme.desc: Tonino Esposito is the worst mafia boss that ever walked the earth, but when he finds out that his daughter is dating the son of a public attorney, he finally gets the chance to prove his worth to the family and the whole city of Naples.

programme.title: Men In the City
programme.desc: A Berlin gym is the stage for five men to play out their testosterone-filled pursuits of casual sex, camaraderie and contoured bodies. As they stumble from one misadventure to another, including wrestling a crocodile, they learn the meaning of true love.

programme.title: Here And There
programme.desc: Returning from the US, Pedro comes home to his family in Mexico. With the money he has made, he hopes to secure a better life with his family, mend his relationship with them, and hopes to achieve his lifelong dream of starting a band.

programme.title: Take Me Home
programme.desc: Take Me Home is an epic tale following the journey of a family on the verge of falling apart as they attempt to smuggle their dead grandmother across the Singapore-Malaysia border.

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Meza’s decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Almanya-Willkommen in Deutschland
programme.desc: A migrant Turkish family living in Almanya, Germany struggles with the question: what is really “home” as they decide to return to Turkey? As they reminisce, quarrel, and reconcile, the journey takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Terri
programme.desc: Terri is an often bullied, overweight teen. When he decides to stop trying in school, the garrulous principal, Fitzgerald, becomes concerned. However, what was meant to be a counselling course for Terri becomes a journey of healing for both protagonists.

programme.title: Polite People
programme.desc: A delightful comedy, Polite People is the story of a self-obsessed city dweller, so desperate to leave the city that he lies his way into a small farming community. Little does he know, he is unwittingly walking straight into a small-town political war.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: A Summer in Barcelona
programme.desc: Lisa Hellman falls in love with Catalan bank heir Emilio, but soon realises that both their families are fundamentally incompatible. His family’s wealth and conservatism make Lisa rethink marriage, and she starts to develop feelings for Emilio’s cousin, Pablo.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.title: Pelican Blood
programme.desc: Weibke and her nine-year-old daughter Nicolina are elated when they finally adopt five-year-old Raya. However, Weibke soon notices Raya displaying abnormally aggressive behavior. With advice from experts, Weibke is forced to make a painful decision.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi

programme.title: Wars
programme.desc: Following in her father’s footsteps, and yearning to fill the existential emptiness within her, 20-year-old Emma decides to join the army. In an environment of harsh discipline and repressive rules, Emma unexpectedly falls in love with her superior.

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: Mr. Smith, the angriest, most hardboiled man in the world, finds himself entrusted to protect the most innocent thing of all--a newborn child. When Smith delivers the baby in the middle of a gunfight, he soon discovers that the infant is the target of a shadowy force that has sent a team of mysterious and endless assailants, led by Hertz, to erase all traces of the baby. Amid a hail of bullets and facing every conceivable permutation of gunfight, Smith teams up with a prostitute named DQ to solve the mystery as to why the baby's life is being threatened before this makeshift family all ends up on the wrong side of a bullet. Everyone wants the baby dead. The big question is why?

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 24
programme.desc: As a bank teller, Michael proves chipmunks are nature's accountants. Then while servicing a wake, Michael brings a toy to life, and later, he stuns a museum worker by restarting the evolutionary process for a fossilized creature.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes - Back To The Big Dig
programme.desc: In Double Takes, Michael jumps back in time and unleashes unseen content for a fresh spin on classic Carbonaro bits.

programme.desc: Get a peek behind-the-scenes as Michael pushes magical boundaries with a fiery potato laser and a very unusual puppy.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 5
programme.desc: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose. Takingthese criminals to task is our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Tonya Harding, Jared Logan, and Kevin McCaffrey.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S5 Ep13
programme.desc: Short Fuse - When a terminally ill inmate escapes from a hospital determined to settle old scores before he dies, SWAT must team up with a longtime rival of Hicks to protect the fugitive's targets.

programme.title: CSI: NY S9 Ep1
programme.desc: Reignited - The CSIs investigate when a fire chief - a friend of Mac’s - is killed in a blaze that used the same technique as a recently paroled arsonist.

programme.title: The Rookie S1 Ep17
programme.desc: The Shake Up - A massive earthquake rocks the city and throws everyone’s patrols and its citizens into chaos. Meanwhile, agent Russo recommends Officer Nolan for a protective detail of Brad Hayes.

programme.desc: Where There’s Smoke… - The CSIs rush to stop serial arsonist Leonard Brooks after he begins using fire against people from his dark past.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawai'i S2 Ep2

programme.desc: Pipe Cleaner - When the CSIs are called to investigate human remains found in a convention center owner’s bathtub, Sara and Grissom use the case to get close to attorney Anson Wix’s star forensic expert witness, just days before David Hodges’ trial begins.
