programme.desc: Poland - Tatra Mountains - Explore the craggy ridge-lines of the Polish Tatra Mountains as they rise skyward. This precious tract of alpine wilderness is relatively small but power-packed with incredible trekking and scenery.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Countdown Special S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Robson Green recalls his most memorable Extreme Fishing moments. He has found himself in some tricky situations and come face to face with some amazing fish and fisherman and women.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Alaska - Robson heads north to Alaska for extreme temperatures and extreme fish, including northern pike, king salmon, cod, chinook salmon and rainbow trout.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summer’s soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand’s South Island, where one of the world’s longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Life on the Wing - Yala National Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 species of bird. This paradise offers many possibilities for parents who can weather the ever-changing climate. Every species must either raise their offspring here or find a new home before the dry season ends and the monsoon storms begin.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Fires of Pele - The number one tourist attraction on the island of Hawaii is a volcano called Kilauea. After a sudden collapse of the crater floor, a massive eruption drains the volcano of lava and now Kilauea is silent. Geologist Phillip Ong finally has his chance to explore.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Dune Kingdoms - Just off the east coast of South Africa, lie two different worlds. One is a stage for the bold and the beautiful. While in the other, ambush and camouflage reign. Both are home to a vast array of life, from ancient residents to ocean wanderers. These are the Dune Kingdoms of Aliwal and Sodwana.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life and Death in the Dunes - The Arabian Desert is one of the most challenging places on earth, but the animals here are resilient and specialized. Even for the hardiest inhabitants, death’s never far away. Creatures must seize every opportunity to find food, shelter and water. Adaptability is the key to dune survival.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story 1 Ep1
programme.desc: March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the world’s 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are nature’s best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summer’s soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Stinkers - In nature, the right stench can mean the difference between life or death. Meet nature's odor-equipped inhabitants, from vomiting grasshoppers to dung-flinging hippos, and even a flower that's adapted to smell like death.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story 1 Ep1
programme.desc: March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the world’s 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are nature’s best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summer’s soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand’s South Island, where one of the world’s longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Winged Weirdos - One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ugly - Gawk at some of the world’s ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but they’re evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Cape Fur Seals - On South Africa’s west coast, Cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that can’t swim, it’s a challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Wonders of the Wadi - A wadi is a waterhole, a rare place in the desert where hard bedrock traps the tiniest traces of water. A vital valley visited by the creepy and bizarre. All animals must come here to drink, something predators are quick to exploit; venomous vipers, glowing scorpions and stalking tarantulas hide in the crevices, ever ready to strike.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of China’s land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of China’s land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hidden Gem of the North - The Steinhuder Meer in the heart of northern Germany is a biodiversity-hotspot in Germany, not far from Hamburg. Different habitats, such as fenlands, alder march, wetlands, and dunes ensure that the largest shallow lake in Germany is extremely attractive to a great variety of different animals, but that's not all: The richly textured landscape is the ideal outdoor laboratory for biologists who operate Germany's significant reintroduction of wildlife.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Andalucia's Struggle - Andalusia is a mosaic of extreme habitats. From the deserted Almeria-region to the snowy mountaintops of the Sierra Nevada, from the dried-out ilex woodlands of the Sierra Morena to the nebulous cork oak forests near Cadiz and Granada’s shrub–covered cliffs. Over the course of histories human settling and hunting had a fundamental impact on these landscapes and their fauna. But today, many of the animals found in Andalusia have found innovative survival strategies and niches that allow them to reclaim Andalusia (only in some cases with a little help of humans).

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Creepy Crawlers - Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Identity Crisis - Are they guinea pigs, beavers, or something else? Capybaras embody the features of several different animals at once, as do warthogs, anteaters, and other fascinating genetic hybrids. Learn why these wannabes display such particular physical traits.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mafia Island - Uncharted Paradise - Just off the Tanzanian coastline lies an island Utopia. Its diverse habitats provide homes for a multitude of creatures living above the water and below. And when the time is right, a mysterious being rises from the deep to feed in the rich waters. This is Mafia Island.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Aerial Masters - The Arabian Peninsula is the world’s transit hub for three billion birds on migration to and from Europe, Africa and Asia. This episode tells the stories of the majestic raptors and magnificent waders, from the largest migrants to the smaller residents, and how they fly, hunt and survive in this region of extremes - both in the wild desert and close to the urban jungle.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatāwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. It’s topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laos’s tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 Ep2

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Predjama - Discover the world's largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also serves as a haven for the birds, boars, and mountain goats that live in the region.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Alhambra - Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spain's Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the region’s wildlife. With its many streams and fountains, Alhambra serves amphibian, fish, and bird alike.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Today Donal shares recipes for dishes including a crispy chicken potato salad, chocolate chip banana bread, and 'greeneroni soup'.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Two single mums in Manchester need Gregg and Chris' help! Working together to feed both families after school is tricky with everyone's different tastes, so can the boys find them tasty meals they can all enjoy together?

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Will's Combine Harvester - Will's family have been farming their land in Lincolnshire for generations. However, in order to generate some extra income, Will calls Simon to help create a unique agricultural-themed B&B.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Nigel and Maria's Caravan - In 2017, Nigel and Maria inherited a 400-year-old farm near Cullompton, in Devon, and want to give up their day jobs to spend as much time as they can on the farm with their family.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Incredible House Transformations - Kevin McCloud and the experts visit five homes that have undergone incredible transformations, from a Dutch barn and a factory reborn, to a library hidden within a former cowshed.

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rick's journey ends in the legendary city of Istanbul, where he arrives just in time for the bluefish season. He also cooks lavish kofte kebabs with pistachios and the Black Sea dish kapuska.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep3
programme.desc: It's waste week. The cooks level up the basic meal deal and create a menu entirely out of leftovers. But one cook's journey in the contest comes to a premature end.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Two single mums in Manchester need Gregg and Chris' help! Working together to feed both families after school is tricky with everyone's different tastes, so can the boys find them tasty meals they can all enjoy together?

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Today Donal shares recipes for dishes including a crispy chicken potato salad, chocolate chip banana bread, and 'greeneroni soup'.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Bethan and John's Railway Carriage - Simon is in Shropshire to help vintage vehicle-loving Bethan and John turn a 1940s railway goods carriage into a unique B&B located in their back garden.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Michele and Tobin's Summerhouse - Simon and his team are in Devon to help create a unique B&B that's not just for people. After achieving their dream of buying a small holding and stables, Michele and Tobin realised that the tired summerhouse on the property could offer lodgings.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Should you meddle with a classic? Nigella thinks that in the case of her crab mac'n'cheese, it's a must. She also cooks up chocolate cookies, chicken with orzo and a rice-filled dessert.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep6
programme.desc: It's the semi-final and the four remaining cooks prepare their fare in front of the judges and create dishes worthy of a double-page spread in their cookbook. Who has reached their final chapter?

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep4
programme.desc: It's veggie week. The cooks level up vegetarian junk food and create a menu of meat alternatives for a packed-out hub, including two Team GB medal winners.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Naomi and Yehuda - Architects Robert and Laura compete using virtual reality to remodel a home in Hertfordshire. Will the finished build live up to the hopes of the family who live there?

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Should you meddle with a classic? Nigella thinks that in the case of her crab mac'n'cheese, it's a must. She also cooks up chocolate cookies, chicken with orzo and a rice-filled dessert.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hrs to Hell and Back S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Seafarer's - Chef Ramsay descends upon a Virginia based seafood restaurant situated right off a busy highway that isn't seeing much business these days. Seafarer's is run by two sisters, Amber and Autumn Halterman, who are always at war with each other.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep6

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6

Now it’s up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.desc: Castles and Caves - Archibald and his siblings embark on a quest in a Castles and Caves adventure game. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep81
programme.desc: Runaway Mo - Stingo is bored, he wants something exciting to do. He decides to take Mo for a spin without asking Fifi first. All goes wrong when Mo gets out of control. Can the tots stop the runaway mower?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep82
programme.desc: Stingo's Enormous Carrot - Pip is trying hard to grow some vegetables. But however hard he tries, they don't seem to get any bigger. But Stingo's vegetable patch next door appears to be doing suspiciously well.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep83
programme.desc: Fifi's Pancake Fun - Fifi and Pip are busy making pancakes. But every time they flip one it disappears, where could they be going?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep84
programme.desc: Pip's Pony - Pip wants a pony. He tries adapting his scooter and Violet even makes him a hobby horse. But nothing is quite right. Until Fifi points out the silver horse made out of stars in the night sky.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep29
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants – and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep30
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep31
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep32
programme.desc: How Can I Stop Little Bird Eating The Seeds? - Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either – which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!

programme.title: Olivia Ep29
programme.desc: Olivia's Day At The Office - When Father takes Olivia and Ian to “bring your kids to work day,” Olivia is looking forward to a fun day with dad at the office. But when Father is given a new deadline for a big project, Olivia hatches a plan to help him out. First, however they have to track down Ian's missing frog.

programme.title: Olivia Ep30
programme.desc: Olivia Helps Mother Nature - After learning about the environment, Olivia is on a mission to recycle, cut down on waste, and conserve energy. But she just can't get Ian to turn off his light at night. Either she'll have to find a way for Ian to fall asleep without it, or else find a sustainable alternative

programme.title: Olivia Ep31
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Vet - After a trip to the vet with Julian's pet lizard Bernie, Olivia is inspired to become a vet herself. She imagines herself curing all kinds of wild animals, and back home she goes to work on the only two patients available: her pets! Her treatments for Edwin and Perry turn out to be a bit messier than she expected.

programme.title: Olivia Ep32
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Chef - It's Mother's birthday, and Olivia's planning something really special: a surprise dinner, with all red food. Imagining she's a famous chef with Dad and Ian as her helpers, the real challenge is keeping mum out of the kitchen while they prepare her special meal.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep29
programme.desc: Why Wildebeest Stampede - You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that ‘they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep30
programme.desc: Why Chameleon Changes Colour - You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey… like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep31
programme.desc: Why Leopard Has Spots - You see there was a time when Leopard didn't have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes… but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep32
programme.desc: Why Hyena Has Short Back Legs - You see there was a time when Hyena didn't have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep59
programme.desc: The Iceman Melteth - A terrifying ice monster comes from the portal with a grudge against Puss in Boots, but when the sun proves too much for the water based beast, the San Lorenzans help in an unexpected way

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out there’s a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep33

programme.desc: Lucky and the Doomed Delivery - Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep7
programme.desc: A Wanderer in Paris - Odlulu has a magical shrinking key in France and has set her sights on the Great Race. Wally and Wenda help local racer Jacques after Odlulu shrunk his and everyone else's bikes.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep7
programme.desc: Ding Dong Day \ Grand Sam - It’s Pawston’s annual Take Your Kid to Work Day, and it’s Tag’s year to spend the day at the Doorbell Store with Paw. \ Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to complete an obstacle course in the woods.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep7
programme.desc: Pet Project / Mission Improbable - When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep13
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sticky Putty - Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest – and play! Good idea Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep14
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Accidents - Something strange is happening in Toyland – trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep33
programme.desc: Unpoppable / Slumber Party Hard - Archibald accidentally ruins Bea’s plans by getting them both stuck in a giant unpoppable bubble. / Archibald invites a friend to the Strutter’s slumber party who’s kind of a downer. programme.desc: The Ripening / Maraca Rock - Berry’s family invites Berry to their annual celebration, which Berry finds tedious, but the Mighty Ones are excited to join in. / Rocksy swaps lives with a maraca bead for the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.desc: Coop, Where's My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where's My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep18
programme.desc: Snoutlout Gets The Axe - When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding, they must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep9
programme.desc: Quake, Rattle And Roll - Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep27
programme.desc: The Ripening / Maraca Rock - Berry’s family invites Berry to their annual celebration, which Berry finds tedious, but the Mighty Ones are excited to join in. / Rocksy swaps lives with a maraca bead for the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep85
programme.desc: Aunt Tulip's Carnival - All the tots are excited as Aunt Tulip is holding a Caribbean themed carnival. But will the weather hold long enough for them to have their celebrations?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep86
programme.desc: Storm - It is a windy day in the garden, Fifi's washing has blown away. Poppy offers to find it, but she gets caught in the storm. The other tots set out to find her and spend a wild night out in the open.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep87
programme.desc: Just One Hornetto - Stingo's cousin Hornetto pays a visit to the garden and quickly charms all the tots. Stingo and Slugsy decide he must be stopped from staying permanently at all costs!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep88
programme.desc: Wasps - Stingo is very depressed. All the tots have noticed it. They decide to organise a very special "wasp" surprise for Stingo.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep33
programme.desc: How Can I Go Up And Down On The See-Saw? - Baa and Billie have built a fantastic new see-saw in the meadow. Jess can't wait to have a go. But when he tries to make it go up and down with him on one end and Baa and Billie on the other he just gets stuck in the air and can't get the see saw down. ‘How can I go up and down on the see saw?' he asks? -desperate to have all the ‘up and down' fun he see the puppies having when they jump on the see-saw. Jess asks Horace the hoppy frog what he knows about ‘up and down', he talks to Willow about scales and weighing things until finally he works it out – if he finds someone roughly the same weight as him – balanced just like the puppies were - he'll do it! He works out that Mimi - of all his friends- weighs about the same as him and just as he worked out they jump on the see saw and go up and down, up and down and have a fantastic time! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep34
programme.desc: What Can I Do With My Nature Collection? - Jess shows Mimi his lovely Nature Collection. She really likes it and wonders what he's going to do with it. Now that's a good question! Jess thinks he'll display it but with the pups racing around it'd soon get damaged. He asks Horace if he could use it to make musical instruments, some things make a great sound but others aren't so good. It's time to go on a picnic with Mimi and his friends. Jess brings his Nature Collection along and when all his friends want to play a game Jess has a great idea. He's found the perfect thing to do with his Nature Collection! They can use them to make a funny obstacle course race. Brilliant!

programme.desc: The Remember-ator - Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep136
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.desc: Treasure Park/Baddy Long Legs - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Hollywood, USA - After winning a part in a Hollywood film, Glitch is not happy when he has to work with Kyan to finish a scene.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Sami Reindeer Herding, Norway - The Go Jetters are in snowy Norway to learn about the Sami reindeer. The reindeers are migrating and need to get a ferry to their warmer summer home.

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Humpty Do, What About You? - When Humpty Do wins a prize of 100 sherbet termites he decides to share them with his friends.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep81
programme.desc: Give It Back - Tinky Winky and Dipsy both want a go with Tinky Winky's bag and start to squabble. The Noo-­‐noo sucks up the bag and only gives it back when Tinky Winky and Dipsy are ready to share.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Nose - Dee encourages a friend to say 'nose' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different noses - funny noses, bunny noses, sniffy noses and even snoring noses!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep65
programme.desc: The Wind In Her Sails - Sailor Po can't sail her yacht unless Team Tinpo can find some wind for her sails.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep12
programme.desc: It's time for carnival - JoJo wants to celebrate the St Lucia carnival with Great Gran Gran, but it's too far away to travel to! Instead, JoJo and Gran Gran have their own carnival in the garden!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Tasty Trip - After seeing an advertisement for the World Food Festival, Monty wonders if there are ways to explore the world other than travelling.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Pea Soup - Monty thinks Gran's soup might be the tastiest ever, but he wonders how you can know if something is the best in the world.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Bike - Bluey is struggling to learn how to ride her bike. But as she and Dad watch her friends determination with their own tasks, Bluey is inspired to give it another try.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep33
programme.desc: The Babysitting Badge - Duggee has a job to do outside of the Clubhouse. But who will look after the Squirrels? King Tiger of course, he has his Babysitting Badge. But then the Squirrels end up babysitting King Tiger!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep31
programme.desc: The A Cappella Badge - The Squirrels are inspired to learn how to sing a cappella style after hearing a famous bird quartet singing in a nearby tree.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep30
programme.desc: The Topiary Badge - When the Squirrels see Duggee practicing his impressive Topiary skills they are keen to try some of their own - and promptly put their new talents into practice in order to tame some very wild woods!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: The Continent of Europe - When Tala bases her class project on her uncle's travels, the Go Jetters swing into action and help Grandmaster Glitch take his own souvenir selfies across the continent of Europe.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Continent of Africa - Glitch takes Tala to the continent of Africa to help her with an Academy project. When the pair get lost, the Go Jetters need to crack the clues and find them in this huge continent.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hotel - Bluey and Bingo run a crazy "Hotel" with Dad as their put upon guest. But when Bingo quits over Bluey being too controlling, Dad needs to teach them how to compromise.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Horsey Ride - When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Andy and the Saddleback Clownfish - When the saddleback clownfish leave the safety of their carpet anemone home back at Safari World, Andy travels to the Great Barrier Reef in Australia to find out why.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Devil's Coach Horse Beetles - Chantelle and friends look for a special beetle, and Rory meets a beetle expert.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Bellywobble - A team of Swashbucklers takes on the Bouncy Sails and enters the Tangled Net in pursuit of Gem's jewels. Meanwhile, Sinker remembers working for her scary first boss Captain Bellywobble.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep29
programme.desc: The Favourite Badge - The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding what their own favourite things are, so they make a film asking some of their friends what is special to them to help narrow it down.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Monteverde Cloud Forest, Costa Rica - A feather duster drama unfolds high in the Monteverde Cloud Forest when Glitch's feather collecting goes wrong. Can the Go Jetters save a rare bird's nest and find a lost trophy?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - While Lars, Kelly and Xuli go into the sewers to help keep London clean, Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes down the toilet.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep18
programme.desc: O the Indignity - Gordon is put in charge of Whiff's Waste Dump for the day.

programme.desc: The Big Sleepover - The little girl and her feathery friend have a sleepover with some friends, but struggle to get to nod off.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Rain Dance - Nelly and Nora discover the animals dance after every rain shower.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep32

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep22

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep63

programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Goin Clubbin' / Totally Board - After beating Hugo at a game of Crazy Golf, Raj needs to find a way to get back in his good graces.// The death-defying day of skate is coming to town and Sammy finally has a chance to prove to Hugo that he's not 'Silly Sammy'.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Clean Machine - It's mothers day - and Sammy has the perfect gift for Uma: a robot that can help the whole family.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Munk Vs Machine - The Chipmunks and Chipettes compete in a dodgeball tournament but no-one expects Theo to be their secret weapon.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Shack Magic - The Chipmunks find a shack that magically fills with toys and games, but is it magic or something more sinister?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer / Pineapple RV - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long. // SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Smurf Your Seatbelts! / Leaf It Alone - When Handy and Storm discover Gargamel's plan to make Azrael fly, they build their own flying machines. // When the Sarsaparilla harvest is ruined by a pest, the Smurfs discover Gargamel's plan to lure them to his field.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Salvador Doggy - When faced with a deadline and no inspiration, Frida tries to use Lalo's paintings as her own!

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Scoop Snoop - The Action News Team struggles to find out how Katherine Mulligan is scooping their news leads.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Present Tense / Any Given Sundae - Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift. // Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Classified - G.H.O.S.T. Special Agent Schloder pursues Twitch after mistaking her for a Decepticon. Meanwhile, Dot is put through G.H.O.S.T. orientation, where she learns that her employer's intentions may not be what they seem.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep207
programme.desc: Mimic Madness / House Worming - SpongeBob learns that "imitation is the sincerest form of flattery" - too bad no one told him how to stop! // When worms move in to SpongeBob's holes, it's up to him to hide his disgusting new friends from everyone else.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep208
programme.desc: Snooze You Lose / Krusty Katering - Squidward is so tired that SpongeBob & Patrick can't wake him up, but they won't let him miss his big audition! // Mr. Krabs & his crew cater a fancy party, but they might be out of their depth with their new wealthy customers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep209
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Place / Plankton Gets the Boot - When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place. // When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep210
programme.desc: Life Insurance / Burst Your Bubble - After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger! // When SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, everyone in town wants one! Everyone except Mrs. Puff, that is.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Operation Dad - Ronnie Anne tries to convince her Dad to move to the city while he is visiting. With the help of Sid, she devices a plan that seems too good to fail.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Parker Gets Rich / Ultimate Fighting Cloud - After winning a raffle, Parker comes into a large sum of money, which Angus warns will come at a cost. // The Middlemost Post discover a secret backyard wrestling league that challenges both their skills and egos.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Leprechauns 2 - Bud and Buddy return to the mountain, claiming they're reformed leprechauns no longer seeking Parker's gold.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Part 2 - Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Mama Told Me Not to Kung Fu - Crane's mom visits the Valley of Peace. Crane reveals to Po that his mom hates Kung Fu so he promised her that he would never have anything to do with it. Crane asks Po and the others to help him keep his secret from his mom.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Desert - Aang searches for Appa, while Katara struggles to keep everyone together so they can survive in the vast desert. Meanwhile, Uncle and Zuko seek help from an ancient secret society.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Tunnel of Love / Skipper Makes Perfect - When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation. // Skipper's having one of those perfect days, and he decides to use the opportunity to settle an old score.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Penguin Who Loved Me - When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out it’s to free her brother Francis who happens to be a “mind-jacked” Dr. Blowhole.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Lost at Pond / From Bad to Nurse - When the guys get stranded in the middle of the Great Pond, they're forced to level up into "Survivor Ducks." // SwaySway and Buhdeuce show off their "bread-side" manner by nursing their number one customer back to health.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Queen is Back - Kendar decides to give Axe to Alivn the demon so Alvin will leave them all alone. Brendar and the gang are devastated and decide to go on a quest to rescue Axe.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Slice of Life / Goodnight, Sleep Fright - When Ollie throws a pizza slice into his pack, a monster comes looking for revenge after his world is destroyed. // Ollie's insecurity gets him stuck in his dreams after summoning the Dream Wheezy to help him sleep.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep119
programme.desc: You Got Served / How to Make Enemies and Bend People to Your Will - While helping Señor Hueso at Run of the Mill Pizza, Leo and Mikey get sidetracked by brotherly competition. // Baron Draxum struggles to move up the ladder in the Foot Clan.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Hot Sauce Boss / Ghost Pool - When Chicken Chuck adds his own sauce to Penny’s hot wings, a heated competition erupts between the longtime friends. // The kids go on a quest to find a legendary pool in the forest.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Dorg Needs a Shot / Dorg Wants a Shortcut - Dorg thinks his worst nightmare is needles, but when Fretta and Mr Munch go on a few dates, he realizes their budding romance is much worse! // The Magicals build shortcut tunnels so they can slide straight to every place in Normill.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Norse Code / The Great Bicycle Mystery - Fanboy and Chum Chum are excited when their Viking friend, Thorvald, visits them from Valhalla. // Lenny's bike was taken from outside the Frosty Mart! Good thing Fanboy and Chum Chum are on the case.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Monkey Business / Diary of a Mad Cat - When Birdbrain attempts to kidnap the latest boy band sensation, the Hunky Monkeys, it’s up to the gang at TUFF to save them. // In attempt to learn more about Kitty, Dudley accidentally sends her diary out in a mass email to everyone in Petropolis.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep625
programme.desc: Acheron - As the Winx prepare for Daphne and Thoren's wedding, they soon discover that Selina freed Acheron. Acheron banishes the Trix to the Legendarium and then removes all magic from the Magic Dimension - except for the dragon flame!

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Winx Forever - While the Winx battle the Great Lizard Spirit, Bloom fights Acheron and the Trix in the Legendarium World. The Winx need all the help they can get - even Selina's - to fight dark magic and restore order in the magic dimension.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Little Monster / The Great Mighty Mythic Marathon - Timmy asks Felicity and Miguel to babysit his nephew. // All of Mythlandia competes for the ultimate prize.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: The Krusty Bucket / Squid's on a Bus - Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer. // Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep201
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutmare / Bulletin Board - Sandy creates the latest acorn-based food sensation, but her tree pays the price for her greed. // SpongeBob erects a community bulletin board in the Krusty Krab, but anonymous reviews posted on it lead to trouble.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep202
programme.desc: Food Con Castaways / Snail Mail - The gang heads to a food convention, but things go awry when they become stranded in the woods. // SpongeBob accidentally fibs to his pen pal, but when his friend comes to visit, he must keep the ruse going!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep203
programme.desc: Pineapple Invasion / Salsa Imbecilicus - When SpongeBob hides the secret formula in his home, it’s up to Gary to protect it from Plankton. // When a freak accident causes everyone in town to become as stupid as Patrick, Sandy must save the day.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep204

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Sophie covers perennial principles; Jane visits a centenarian gardener; Tammy cares for African violets; Costa features strappy-leaved plants; Jerry refreshes a raised bed; and we meet a garden guru in arid Alice Springs.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - The Rookies battle busted hoses and finally hit treasure, Boulder Boys Aaron and Greg bring in an old monster about to self-destruct, and at their wash plant, The Cooke Brothers race to beat the worst drought in a decade.

programme.title: Ticket To The Cup Ep3
programme.desc: In two weeks, all eyes will be on Australia as we co-host the FIFA Women's World Cup. Tracey Holmes brings you stories and interviews as 32 teams and thousands of fans arrive for one of the world's biggest sporting events.

programme.title: Landline Ep22
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep116
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: Australian Story - A Brilliant Canvas - John Olsen Ep14
programme.desc: A story of art, fame and family. The late John Olsen, one of our most beloved painters, had an obsessive focus on his work, often casting a shadow on those around him. John and family open up about art and the cost of fame.

programme.title: China Tonight Ep11
programme.desc: 2023 marks 50 years since Prime Minister Gough Whitlam's 1973 diplomatic trip to China, the first by an Australian Prime Minister and a milestone in Australia-China relations. Will Anthony Albanese repeat the trip this year?

programme.title: The Drum Ep121
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep136
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep105
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep136
programme.desc: More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep93
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show brings you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and business owners. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep136
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: One Plus One - The Elders - Aunty Fay Clayton Moseley Ep6
programme.desc: Aunty Fay Clayton Moseley was taken by authorities when she was 10 and told her parents didn't want her. It would be years until she learnt the truth. Fay shares her painful past, and how she's found healing through painting.

programme.title: The World Ep136
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Forces of Nature - Fire Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Blazes fuelled by wind, dry bush and weather can consume everything in their path. Aaron Pedersen explains how nowhere on Earth burns with quite the same intensity and ferocity as Australia - or as regularly.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep906EdwardsvsDiaz
programme.desc: Fan favorite Nate Diaz returned to action taking on surging welterweight contender Leon “Rocky” Edwards at UFC 263. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their battle in front of a packed house in Glendale, Arizona.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC281AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 281 as middleweight champion Israel Adesanya faced former foe Alex Pereira. Plus, Carla Esparza had her first title defense against former champion Zhang Weili. See the entire main card, and more, of UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC 290: Volkanovski vs. Rodriguez
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC 290: Volkanovski vs. Rodriguez is an upcoming event headlined by a featherweight title fight between champion Alexander Volkanovski and challenger Yair Rodriguez. Volkanovski, a dominant force in the division, aims to defend his title for the fifth time and solidify his legacy. Rodriguez, known for his unorthodox striking style, seeks to claim the featherweight championship and make a statement. The event promises an exciting fight card with compelling matchups across different weight classes, delivering a night of thrilling mixed martial arts action

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Main Event - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas.
